description: OnePlus 15R doesn’t look like a radical departure from earlier R-series phones at first glance, but it feels noticeably more capable in everyday use. Strong flagship-grade performance, a smooth high-refresh-rate display, and excellent battery life form the core of its appeal. While there are some camera trade-offs, the OnePlus 15R stands out as a dependable near-flagship that prioritises power, endurance, and long-term software support.
title: OnePlus 15R Review: A Performance-First Experience

description: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS will make its closest approach to Earth on Dec. 19. Observing the comet provides scientists a rare opportunity to study dust and gases from its icy nucleus and learn more about material forming around other stars, expanding understanding of interstellar objects while posing no threat to our planet.
title: Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Nears Earth on Dec. 19, Offering Rare Insights Into Cosmic Visitors

description: New research suggests the James Webb Space Telescope could help scientists understand dark matter by studying oddly shaped early galaxies. These elongated galaxies may form due to dark matter’s gravitational behaviour, offering indirect clues about whether ultralight or warm dark matter particles shaped the early universe.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Could Help Reveal Dark Matter in a Way Scientists Did Not Anticipate

description: ESA has captured a city-sized butterfly-shaped crater on Mars with smooth wings likely formed by melted underground ice. Studying this rare structure helps scientists understand asteroid impacts, Mars’ surface ice, and the planet’s ancient watery past while offering insight into how unusual crater formations develop on the Red Planet.
title: ESA Reveals City-Size ‘Cosmic Butterfly’ Crater on Mars Containing Signs of Ancient Water

description: Europe’s Ariane 6 rocket has launched its first Galileo navigation satellites, joining the 26-satellite constellation. The mission strengthens Europe’s GPS capabilities and reduces reliance on foreign rockets.
title: Europe’s Ariane 6 Rocket Lifts Off With First Galileo Satellites, Boosting Europe’s Navigation Network

description: NASA’s Parker Solar Probe captured solar wind reversing toward the sun, revealing how magnetic fields recycle coronal material. This process, seen during a close flyby, helps refine models of space weather and may allow scientists to better predict solar storms that can impact satellites, communications, and power systems across the solar system.
title: NASA’s Parker Solar Probe Observes Solar Wind Making ‘U-Turn’, Shedding Light on Space Weather

description: The Holy Grail of Eris is an upcoming animated Japanese novel series that will soon be released on the OTT platform.
title: The Holy Grail of Eris OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: OnePlus 15R has been launched in India and the handset will be available in the country via Amazon, OnePlus India online store, and other offline retail channels in three colourways. The new smartphone is powered by Qualcomm’s new octa core Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, which is built on a 3nm process. The phone is equipped with a 7,400mAh silicon-carbon battery. It supports 80W wired fast charging, too. The new OnePlus 15R sports a 6.83-inch display, which delivers up to 165Hz refresh.
title: OnePlus 15R Launched in India With 7,400mAh Battery, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus Pad Go 2 has been launched in India in two colour options with a 10,050mAh battery. It runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra chipset and features a 12.1-inch LCD panel with up to 120Hz refresh rate. It has a single 8-megapixel rear camera sensor and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: OnePlus Pad Go 2 Launched in India With 10,050mAh Battery, 12.1-Inch Display and 5G Connectivity: Price, Features

description: Google Pay has introduced Flex, a UPI-powered, digital co-branded credit card built on the RuPay network, debuting with the Google Pay Flex Axis Bank Credit Card. Users can apply within the app, earn instant rewards, and manage payments and repayments directly in Google Pay. The launch is aimed at increasing everyday credit access in India.
title: Flex By Google Pay: Google Partners With Axis Bank to Introduce UPI-Powered, Digital Credit Card

description: Amazon Pay has introduced the new biometric authentication feature for UPI transactions. However, the company will only allow users to make payments of up to Rs. 5,000 using the new feature. The tech giant claims that people will no longer have to enter their UPI pins to complete a transaction, as they can directly validate them using their fingerprint and facial biometrics. In the past, companies like Navi UPI, Samsung Wallet, and NPCI have also introduced this feature.
title: Amazon Pay Adds Support for Biometric Authentication for UPI Payments in India

description: Dress to Impress codes allow Roblox players to unlock free outfits and accessories without spending Robux. With several active codes available in December 2025, players can expand their wardrobe using festive and exclusive cosmetic items. Redeeming codes is simple, but they are time-limited, making it important to use them before they expire.
title: Dress to Impress Codes (December 2025): Full List of Active Codes, Rewards, and More

description: Many employees find it difficult to access their EPF account. In this article, we will guide you through the step-by-step process of logging into the EPFO Member Portal. Every employee needs to activate their UAN (Universal Account Number) before proceeding. Also, make sure that your mobile number is linked to the UAN for successful OTP verification.
title: How to Log in to the EPFO Member Portal: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: iPhone 17 series, including the iPhone 17 Pro Max, iPhone 17 Pro, and the standard iPhone 17, was launched by Apple in global markets, including India, in September. Next year, the Cupertino company is expected to skip the launch of a standard iPhone 18, while introducing its first foldable handset, dubbed iPhone Fold. While most details about the iPhone 18 Pro series and the iPhone Fold remain under wraps, their features have now surfaced online.
title: iPhone 18 Pro, iPhone Fold to Feature Relocated Selfie Camera; iPhone 17e to Offer MagSafe Support: Report

description: After deliberating and reviewing Paramount’s bid, Warner Bros.’ board will urge shareholders to reject the tender offer, said the people, who asked not to be identified discussing confidential information. The board still views the company’s existing agreement with streaming leader Netflix as offering greater value, certainty and terms than what Paramount has proposed, they said.
title: Warner Bros. Plans to Reject Paramount Bid on Funding, Terms

description: Bethesda announced The Elder Scrolls 6 in 2018, but the game doesn't yet have a release date. In a new interview, Bethesda director Todd Howard has said development on the game was "progressing really well". The Elder Scrolls 6 is still likely years away from launch.
title: Development on The Elder Scrolls 6 Is 'Progressing Really Well', Says Bethesda Director Todd Howard

description: The Pitt is an Emmy-Winning American medical drama series that is set to land with its second season on JioHotstar.
title: The Pitt Season 2 OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Home Town is an American reality show that is now streaming on Netflix with seasons 3 to 9. The viewers can engage in this creative show where a couple transforms historic homes to save the legacy of their town.
title: Home Town Streaming Now Online: Know Where to Watch This American Reality Show

description: Meta has launched SAM Audio, a new open-source AI model that can identify and isolate specific sounds from complex audio. Part of the Segment Anything Model family, it supports text prompts, visual cues and time-based inputs to simplify audio editing. Meta says the tool can automate tasks that usually require specialised software, and it is available for both research and commercial use.
title: Meta’s New Open-Source SAM Audio AI Model Can Isolate Sounds From Audio Mixtures

description: Motorola Edge 70 was recently launched in India and recent reports suggested the smartphone maker could be preparing to unveil an Ultra model. However, a tipster has now leaked images of the company's next phone, which could arrive as the Motorola Signature. The leaked images suggest that the phone could sport a redesigned square-shaped rear camera module, featuring three sensors. Earlier reports stated that the handset could be offered in blue and green colourways. However, the latest leak hints at another colour option, dubbed Martini Olive.
title: Motorola Signature Phone Design, Colourways Spotted in Renders That Match Motorola Edge 70 Ultra

description: Streaming on Netflix from January 14, 2026, Taskaree: The Smuggler’s Web stars Emraan Hashmi in a gripping crime drama created by Neeraj Pandey. The series explores the complex world of smuggling, law enforcement, and hidden power structures, with an IMDb rating expected post-release.
title: Taskaree: The Smuggler’s Web OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Emraan Hashmi's Intense Crime Thriller

description: Vivo V70 with model number V2538 has been spotted on the FCC database. The listing suggests that the Vivo V70 supports 5G, Bluetooth, NFC, and Wi-Fi 6. It could come with Android 16. The listing shows the phone with 12GB RAM and a 256GB storage option. The Vivo V70 is likely to come with upgrades over the Vivo V60. It is likely to run on the Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset.
title: Vivo V70 Stops By US FCC Database; Listing Reveals RAM and Storage Specifications

description: Dawood is a Tamil crime comedy thriller directed by Prashanth Raman, blending suspense, action, and humour through a gripping underworld tale. It explores how one wrong decision can change an ordinary life forever. The film stands out for its unique storytelling and mysterious central antagonist.
title: Dawood OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Crime Comedy Thriller Online?

description: Dhurandhar, directed by Aditya Dhar and produced by Aditya Dhar, Lokesh Dhar, and Jyoti Deshpande, is a Hindi action-packed spy thriller. The film stars Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna, featuring espionage, high-stakes missions, and gripping suspense. Released in theatres with over 300 crore collection, it will stream on Netflix between Jan 16–30, 2026, and is trending on social media.
title: Dhurandhar OTT Release Date: What We Know So Far

description: Google Labs has rolled out an experimental AI agent called CC inside Gmail, aimed at daily productivity. Available to Google AI Pro and Ultra users in the US and Canada, CC scans Gmail, Calendar, Drive and even the web to send a short morning brief of tasks and updates. Users can also email instructions to shape what the agent prioritises.
title: Google Labs Introduces a New Experimental AI Agent That Connects to Gmail, Drive

description: Instagram for TV app was launched by Amazon in collaboration with Meta on Tuesday. Currently available in the US, the app can be downloaded via the Amazon AppStore. However, only select Fire TV devices support the new Instagram for TV app. It allows users to watch, like, and share Reels from their TVs. Moreover, multiple accounts can be logged in, allowing individuals to view short-form content based on their interests.
title: Instagram for TV Launched With Support for Reels, Multiple Accounts on Amazon's Fire TV Devices

description: Apple is reportedly redesigning the iPhone Air with a second rear camera because of the first model’s poor sales. It’s considering reducing the retail price to make the device more attractive to consumers. The production of the new iPhone Air 2 will reportedly start at Luxshare in China in March.
title: iPhone Air 2 to Launch With Two Rear Cameras, Lower Price Tag; Expected to Go on Sale in 2027: Report

description: Pharma is a Malayalam web series directed by P.R. Arun that explores corporate greed and corruption in the pharmaceutical world. The series raises critical questions about ethics, public health, and power, making it one of the most anticipated OTT releases. It is available in various languages: Hindi, Telugu, Kannada, and Tamil.
title: Pharma OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Un Paarvayil is a Tamil OTT thriller series directed by Kabir Lal and produced by Ajay Kumar Singh & Rekha Singh. It stars Parvati Nair in dual roles, exploring family secrets, mystery, and suspense, creating high anticipation among viewers. The series is quite intriguing and keeps the audience tucked in their couch till the end.
title: Un Paarvayil OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Gripping Tamil Thriller Series Online?

description: Baldur's Gate 3 and Divinity developer Larian Studios is facing backlash after CEO Sven Vincke said in an interview that the company was using generative AI for game development. Vincke, however, said the studio's next game, Divinity, won't have any AI generated content.
title: Baldur's Gate 3 Developer Larian Studios Says It Uses Generative AI, CEO Responds to Backlash

description: Samsung has announced that its Micro RGB TV lineup will expand to more screen sizes in 2026. The premium TVs will be available from 55 inches all the way up to 115 inches, making the technology more accessible beyond ultra-large homes. Samsung says the new range will deliver better colour accuracy and contrast, with full details expected at CES 2026.
title: Samsung Expands Its Micro RGB TV Lineup, Brings New Display Sizes Ahead of CES 2026

description: Honor Win series is all set to launch in China next week. They are currently available for pre-reservations in China. The listing shows Black, Blue and White colour options for the Honor Win and Win RT. The Honor Win is confirmed to be available in 12GB+256GB, 12GB+512GB, 16GB+512GB and 16GB+1TB RAM and storage options. The standard model is said to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, and the Win RT may run on the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset.
title: Honor Win, Honor Win RT Launch Date, Colourways, RAM and Storage Configurations Revealed

description: OpenAI has rolled out a revamped ChatGPT Images experience, powered by a new GPT Image 1.5 model. The upgrade brings faster image generation, better instruction-following and more precise edits, with OpenAI claiming speeds up to four times faster. A new dedicated Images space also makes it easier to create and refine visuals, and the feature is available to free users as well.
title: OpenAI Releases Upgraded ChatGPT Images, Takes on Google’s Nano Banana Pro

description: Realme 16 Pro series, including the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G and the Realme 16 Pro 5G, will be launched in India soon, the company recently announced. The lineup is confirmed to go on sale in the country via Flipkart and the company website. Ahead of its debut in India, the Chinese version of the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G has been listed on a certification website, revealing its key specifications and features. The phone is listed with a 200-megapixel primary rear camera, paired with an 8-megapixel ultrawide and a 50-megapixel telephoto camera.
title: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G Key Specifications Including 7,000mAh Battery, 6.8-Inch Display Revealed via Certification Website

description: Moto G Power (2026) was launched in select markets on Tuesday. The successor to the Moto G Power (2025) comes with several iterative improvements and a higher price point, but no major upgrades. It continues to be equipped with the same MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor that powered the previous generation, and brings similar battery specifications as well. This year’s version, however, is available in two new colour options, an improvement to the front camera, and improved display protection.
title: Moto G Power (2026) Launched With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 5200mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus 15 was launched gloablly, including in India, on November 13 as the company’s latest flagship offering. Now, the handset is available at a discounted price in the country, as the tech firm has announced its OnePlus Community Sale, which ends on November 18. Apart from the OnePlus 15, the OnePlus 13s, OnePlus Nord 5, and Nord CE 5 can also be purchased at relatively low prices. The company is offering an instant discount of up to Rs. 4,000 on credit cards of select banks.
title: OnePlus Community Sale: OnePlus 15, Nord CE 5, and Wireless Audio Devices Available at Discounted Prices

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra has been in rumours for the last few months. Ahead of the formal launch, the handset has allegedly been spotted on the US Federal Communications Commission (FCC) website and IMEI database, pretty much confirming its arrival. The listings reveal the connectivity options of the phone. It is speculated to go official on December 26.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Reportedly Listed on US FCC and IMEI Databases, Hinting at Imminent Global Debut

description: OnePlus 15R and OnePlus 15R Ace Edition will be launched in India later today by the Chinese smartphone maker. Both handsets will be available for purchase in the country via Amazon and the OnePlus India online store. The company is hosting a live event in India's Bengaluru to unveil the phones. The OnePlus 15R is claimed to be the world's first Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset-powered smartphone globally. It will carry a dual rear camera unit with a 50-megapixel main shooter and an 8-megapixel ultrawide camera.
title: OnePlus 15R, OnePlus 15R Ace Edition Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specs and More
